protocol.title: 8-Phase Remnant Protocol
protocol.summaryMd: A repeatable formation loop for separating from Babylon, anchoring in truth, moving in obedience, establishing territory, guarding what’s planted, and shining with faithful witness.
protocol.declarationMd: Father, I listen and obey. I confirm by Your Word, cut what is false, anchor deep in truth, move with purpose, establish what You assign, guard what You plant, and shine—reflecting Jesus. Amen.

usageModes.name: Personal Daily (10–20 minutes)

steps.title: Listen
steps.stepsMd: 2–5 minutes silence. Ask: “What are You saying?” Write one sentence.

steps.title: Confirm
steps.stepsMd: Test that sentence against Scripture and fruit.

steps.title: Anchor
steps.stepsMd: Read one passage; memorize one line.

usageModes.notesMd: Use as a quick loop to stay clean, focused, and obedient.

usageModes.name: House-Church / Team Weekly (60–90 minutes)

steps.title: Listen
steps.stepsMd: 2 minutes silence; share what you sensed.

steps.title: Guard
steps.stepsMd: Pray protection; fast schedule; boundary check.

steps.title: Shine
steps.stepsMd: Plan one outward act: testimony, service, outreach.

usageModes.notesMd: Keep it simple: truth, repentance, obedience, and clean witness.

phases.title: Listen
phases.aimMd: Stillness. Spirit-led. Block noise. Receive instruction.
phases.summaryMd: Still your inner world so you can hear God without competing voices.

practices.title: Silence + journal
practices.stepsMd:
- 2 minutes stillness
- Ask: “What are You saying?”
- Ask: “What am I avoiding?”
- Write 1 sentence instruction
- Write 1 next step

practices.title: Input fast (optional)
practices.stepsMd:
- 24 hours: no news/social/entertainment
- Replace with Scripture + prayer
- Note what cravings surface

commonTraps.label: Trap
commonTraps.bodyMd: Using “waiting” as delay; seeking vibes instead of voice.

phases.declarationMd: I block noise and receive instruction.

phases.title: Confirm
phases.aimMd: Scripture. Witness. Discern. Don’t act on impulse.
phases.summaryMd: Test what you heard with Scripture, fruit, and wise counsel.

practices.title: Three Witness Test
practices.stepsMd:
- Word: does Scripture permit/command it?
- Spirit: is there sober conviction and peace?
- Fruit/Counsel: what do mature believers see?

practices.title: One sentence clarity
practices.stepsMd: Write the instruction in one sentence. If you can’t, you’re not ready to move.

signsOfAlignment.label: Stability
signsOfAlignment.bodyMd: It holds up under time, prayer, and counsel.

phases.prayerMd: Give me discernment and honest witness.
phases.declarationMd: I will not act on impulse.

phases.title: Cut
phases.aimMd: Sever false ties. Cancel distractions. Exit Babylon.
phases.summaryMd: Remove attachments and pipelines that feed compromise and distraction.

practices.title: Cut one access point
practices.stepsMd:
- Delete an app/subscription
- End a time-wasting routine
- Establish a boundary
- Close one open loop (apology, repentance, decision)

practices.title: Distraction list → deletion list
practices.stepsMd: List 10 distractions. Choose 3 to remove today.

signsOfAlignment.label: Lightness
signsOfAlignment.bodyMd: Focus returns; appetite for holiness increases.

commonTraps.label: Trap
commonTraps.bodyMd: Cutting people instead of patterns; rage-driven pruning.

phases.prayerMd: Give me courage to cut what competes with You.
phases.declarationMd: I sever false ties and walk free.

phases.title: Anchor
phases.aimMd: Root in truth. Covenant with God. Plant Word deep.
phases.summaryMd: Build depth that survives pressure: Word, covenant, and daily rhythm.

practices.title: Choose 3 anchors
practices.stepsMd:
- Pick 3 Scriptures for this season
- Memorize 1 verse per week
- Pray them daily

practices.title: Truth Protocol (mini)
practices.stepsMd:
- What I believe
- What I refuse
- What I will obey this week

signsOfAlignment.label: Stability
signsOfAlignment.bodyMd: You remain steady under stress; repentance is quick.

commonTraps.label: Trap
commonTraps.bodyMd: Information without embodiment; study without obedience.

phases.prayerMd: Plant Your Word deep in me.

phases.title: Move
phases.summaryMd: Obedience with feet: execute the next clear step with a plan.

practices.title: Write the move
practices.stepsMd:
- Where/what is the shift?
- What does it cost?
- What’s the first step?
- Who holds me accountable?

practices.title: Budget alignment
practices.stepsMd:
- Cut leaks
- Build runway
- Fund obedience
- Remove fragile dependencies

commonTraps.label: Trap
commonTraps.bodyMd: Waiting for certainty God only gives in motion.

phases.prayerMd: Strengthen me to move with obedience.

phases.title: Establish
phases.aimMd: Build altar. Set rhythm. Claim territory. Name it.
phases.summaryMd: Turn obedience into a stable system: altar, rhythm, governance, and naming.

practices.title: Set a weekly liturgy
practices.stepsMd:
- Word
- Prayer
- Communion
- Testimony
- Mission action

practices.title: Name the territory
practices.stepsMd: Write: “In this house/team we…” (values + standards + boundaries).

commonTraps.label: Trap
commonTraps.bodyMd: Building a brand instead of an altar; structure without presence.

phases.prayerMd: Teach us to establish what You assign.
phases.declarationMd: We establish righteous rhythm and territory.

phases.title: Guard
phases.aimMd: Watch over what was planted. Block deception. Fast often.
phases.summaryMd: Protect the seed: boundaries, discernment, fasting, and vigilance.

practices.title: Input gate
practices.stepsMd:
- Audit inputs weekly
- Remove what distorts
- Replace with Scripture + worship

practices.title: Fast (simple start)
practices.stepsMd:
- Skip one meal
- Pray during that time
- Recommit to obedience

signsOfAlignment.label: Protection
signsOfAlignment.bodyMd: Fewer ambushes; faster recovery; stronger discernment.

commonTraps.label: Trap
commonTraps.bodyMd: Paranoia; obsession with darkness; isolation disguised as holiness.

phases.prayerMd: Guard what You planted in us.
phases.declarationMd: I watch over what God entrusted.

phases.title: Shine
phases.aimMd: Speak boldly. Create. Share light. Train others. Reflect the King.
phases.summaryMd: Output with integrity: testimony, teaching, creativity, and multiplication.

practices.title: Weekly light output
practices.stepsMd:
- One testimony
- One teaching
- One act of service
- One invite (train someone)

practices.title: Simple multiplication
practices.stepsMd: I do → you watch → we do together → you do, I watch.

signsOfAlignment.label: Fruit
signsOfAlignment.bodyMd: People strengthen around you; truth spreads; fruit remains.

commonTraps.label: Trap
commonTraps.bodyMd: Performing for approval; shining without guarding (burnout).

phases.prayerMd: Let my life reflect Jesus with clarity and love.
phases.declarationMd: I shine to reflect the King.

diagnostics.descriptionMd: Too much noise. Return to signal.
Re-root in Word and covenant rhythm.
Execute the next step with purpose.
Fortify boundaries, discern inputs, and fast.
Share light with integrity and train others.
